mapper.select: SELECT no, title, user_id AS userId, (select user_nm from auth_member where user_id = t1.user_id) AS userNm, content, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS regDate, read_cnt AS readCnt, html FROM sk_board t1 WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE sk_board SET read_cnt = read_cnt + 1 WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(A.no,'0') AS no, title, flag from sk_board A right join (select max(no) as no from sk_board where no < #{no} and lev = 0 and flag=#{flag} UNION All select min(no) as no from sk_board where no > #{no} and lev = 0 and flag=#{flag}) B ON A.no = B.no
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(fid)+1,1) AS fid FROM sk_board where flag = #{flag}
